<< isinf elementary functions uminus >>

dec2bin

Convert decimal number to base 2.

Syntax

R = dec2bin(D)
R = dec2bin(D, N)

Input argument

D

a non negative integer smaller than the value returned by flintmax.

N

an integer value. number of digits.

Output argument

R

result of dec2bin: char array.

Description

dec2bin converts decimal number to base 2.

Example

Y = dec2bin(2)

See also

dec2base, bin2dec.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
